_header: Keep well ten and flee from seven / spend well five and come to heaven

BodRawPoe32.Transcription:
Myspend we nott fyveAnd fle we sevenKepe we wel x & com to
                    heven

             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und

         90 (1893): 241-68: 247.

                    hevyn

CULEe435a.Transcription:
Kepe well x Bewar off vijSpend well v & Com to heuenso be
                    hyt Ihesu Amen

Kepe well & flee from vijSpend well v & com to
